titleInfo.title: LSU Music Resources Sheet Music Collection

name.namePart: LSU Libraries: Carter Music Resources Center

mods.abstract: This collection includes over 3,000 pieces of sheet music, the bulk of which was copyrighted between 1880 and 1980. This collection was donated to the Music Resources Department at LSU Libraries. It contains classical, folk, holiday, musical, popular, and sacred music published primarily in America and England.
mods.note: This collection includes over 3,000 pieces of sheet music, the bulk of which was copyrighted between 1880 and 1980.
